names.pinyin: jian pi ping gan xi feng fa
names.english: strengthen the spleen, harmonize the liver and extinguish wind wash
names.commonEnglish: Strengthen the Spleen, Harmonize the Liver and Extinguish Wind Wash

actions: Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness, strengthens the Spleen and harmonizes the Middle Jiao.
With Gan Cao, for Spleen and Heart Deficiency causing facial edema, palpitations, and shortness of breath.
Extinguishes Wind, alleviates spasms, drains Liver Heat and pacifies Liver Yang.
Drains Liver Heat, calms the Liver, extinguishes Wind, controls spasms and convulsions, calms the Liver and anchors the Yang.
Clears Heat, relieves irritability, generates Body Fluids and promotes urination
Drains Damp-Heat from the Liver and Gallbladder channels and drains and pacifies Excess Liver Fire.
Sedates the Heart, clears the Liver and settles tremors and palpitations.
Tonifies the Spleen and augments Qi and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
Drains Damp-Heat from the Liver and Gallbladder
